/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. On the right side of the street, there's a construction site enclosed by a blue fence, indicating ongoing development in the area. The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and enhancing the colors of the surroundings.
